item.title: Reply to https://www.manton.org/2023/07/15/we-finally-installed.html
item.description: I'm happy to know this isn't just me. I've had a fire alarm waiting to be installed for 6 months now but that's future benji's problem.
item.content:encoded: I'm happy to know this isn't just me. I've had a fire alarm waiting to be installed for 6 months now but that's future benji's problem.

item.title: Watched Cosmopolis, (2012) - ★★
item.description: I didn't dislike this. I also didn't like it. It was a pain to get through but I think that's on purpose. This is only my second Cronenberg film which is surprising given how many times I've watched The Fly (1986).
